definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: box, chest, or like receptacle (cf. Ar. rija0zah;un a kind of (camel-) vehicle for women, also a garment containing stones, etc., as balance, makeweight (at side of haudaj); from above √, as swaying ? Syr. roguwzto0 sack, Talm. [[אַרְגָּו]] chest, coffin);—´[[הָא]]: 1Sa 6:8, 1Sa 6:11, 1Sa 6:15, cf. HPS.
